name: Oracle of Light
description:
Welcome to the Oracle of Light game page

Oracle of Light is a narrative based game conceptually driven around sharing a beautiful message to those struggling with the human condition. The source material for the game is inspired by Kahil Gilbran's poems in The Prophet, which is modified and adapted to fit in the game. The book is in the public domain, and I believe it should be shared through new mediums. I hope you enjoy this prototype of the experience, preferably in fullscreen mode.


How to Play

You play as the messenger between celestial beings, the planet Orin and the surrounding stars Mira, Siri, Nasu, and Vena. Click and Drag the screen to move your view through space, and interact with the characters by clicking on them. Read through the dialog and enjoy the scripted interactions that attempt to share poetry and wisdom from The Prophet.

Icons Used

The icons depict the symbols from the Seven Chakras system, I felt these would be could visual indicators, and I tried to relate their usage to struggles in the game.
Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com


Images Used

The background image in the game and on this page is a repeatable texture of a space nebula. Credit goes to WebTreatsEtc on Flickr
